snippet.title: Iron Meat - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description: In this new trailer for Iron Meat, take a look at cool animated scenes, gameplay, enemies, and more from this upcoming run-and-gun arcade shooter game. Iron Meat is set in an apocalyptic future overrun by "The Meat," an iron-ravenous mass mutating everything in its path. Blast your way through retro-inspired stages and bosses to uncover the shocking horrors behind secret experiments on the Moon. Iron Meat will be available on PC in October 2023. A demo is available on Steam.
